name: 2nd International Conference on Microbiology & Infectious Diseases
content: 2nd International Conference on Microbiology & Infectious Diseases which will be held on November 21-22, 2022\. Microbiology & Infectious Diseases Conference 2022 offers an opportunity to interact with the researchers in the field of Microbiology & Infectious Diseases, making the Congress a perfect platform to share experiences, foster collaborations across industry & academia, and share emerging scientific updates across the globe.
